comments:
Using 3.0M7 on Windows 2000.  If you have an XML file in your workspace that
references a DTD, the first right-click on the file causes an XML parse.  If
you're not connected to the internet or your proxy settings are incorrect, this
can result in a lockup of the UI until the connection times out.  The stack for
the call is below:

method]

I suggest that you don't assume a network connection, properly configured proxy,
and valid DTD url in order for the UI to function responsively.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 51008 ***
